channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A hurricane-damaged Louisiana skyscraper is set to be demolished Saturday
item.description: An abandoned 22-story-building in Louisiana that has become a symbol of the destruction inflicted by back-to-back hurricanes in 2020 is set to be demolished.

item.title: ‘The Bear’ and ‘Shogun’ could start claiming trophies early at Creative Arts Emmy Awards
item.description: Top nominees like “Shogun” and “The Bear” will have their first chance at taking home Emmys at this weekend’s Creative Arts Emmy Awards.

item.title: Cowabunga! New England town celebrates being the birthplace of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
item.description: The city where the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles were conceived has largely been overlooked during the crime-fighting quartet’s meteoric rise.
